title: Kundan Emerald Flora Studs - "Pachala Poolu"
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (916 Gold) with Kundan Setting. Features vibrant green Emeralds (Pachalu) and sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Boasts a premium Hyderabadi polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Intricate floral (poolu) design with a central cluster of emeralds surrounded by a halo of brilliantly cut Cubic Zirconia. The Kundan setting, a traditional Indian gem-setting technique, adds a touch of regal elegance. Delicate petal-like arrangement of CZs and gold creates a modern yet timeless appeal. The back features a sturdy screw-back post for comfortable and secure wear.
colors: accented by the vivid green of the emeralds and the dazzling white of the Cubic Zirconia.
occasions: or gifting. The subtle yet elegant design makes it suitable for both traditional and modern ensembles. Ideal for events like sangeet
or as a treasured gift for a special someone.
description: These Kundan Emerald Studs are a harmonious blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The use of high-quality materials ensures lasting beauty and value. The vibrant emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune (Subham), making this piece a meaningful addition to any jewelry collection. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail in Hyderabad, known for its rich jewelry heritage. A perfect embodiment of grace and timeless elegance.
